foo: "In a base you can build all available Buildings. It can have up to 7 subterran layers and a surface layer.\nIf you build a new base it will always consist of the surface layer and 1 subsurface layer. Protect your bases at all costs
column3: for you will loose the game if your last base is destroyed!\nFor each level you dig down
column4: the structures build there will take less damage from attacking UFOs.\nBuildings on the surface (including the elevator) take full damage and for each layer the damage is reduced by 50%. "

foo:
"in the Alphatron mine you will - of course - produce Alphatron. there are 2 factors influencing efficiency:

[indent]The ammount of the Alphatron in the region (see Tutorial: Alphatron)[/indent]
[indent]The amount of workers in the mine[/indent]

When building a mine
column3: the production building is allready in place. Without workers it will only produce at [b]~10% efficiency[/b].\nYou can create quarters
column4: recruit workers and send them to work in the mine to increase output. In a mine you may only build storages and defence buildings. "

foo: "The outpost is a small and cheap version of the base
column3: that is primary used for radarposts.\nOutposts don't have subsurface layers
column4: and therefor are [b]limited to buildings that can be build on the surface[/b] (you cannot build hangars). "
